This dress was perfect for the event that I bought it for. I also wore my dress to an interview. Material is great and it isn’t see through. I definitely recommend it.

Usually my 40 inch bust is a problem but the large fits and looks great. A cute fun little dress to wear with flats and boots or dress up with a heeled sandal. Obviously not an investment piece but great causal or dressy casual out to dinner.  I’m already looking at a floral for spring.

Fit perfectly and very flattering! Could have been a tad longer but I felt super cute in this dress I ordered more patterns!
I love this dress! No need to steam or iron. Fit and length was perfect and I didn’t have any difficulty choosing undergarments. Retro vibe is super fun and would be great with tall boots and a hat!
I did like the dress, however now I need a smaller size. I list so much weight that it’s going to look big on me.
Love this dress

This would be SO cute if it weren’t 1000% see through. Like.. I’d need to wear a full slip under this and I just don’t want to do that. Maybe as a bathing suit coverup this would work, but otherwise… y’all it is transparent.

great look and quality for price

I absolutely love this dress! It’s incredibly versatile, looking fantastic with different jackets and shoes, making it perfect for any occasion. I paired it with a denim jacket and white shoes for a casual look, blazer for a polished work look, and then switched to a leather jacket and boots for a more casual fall vibe. No matter how I styled it, the dress made me feel confident and feminine. The fit is flattering, and the fabric feels comfortable yet high-quality. I can easily see this becoming a staple in my wardrobe!
The sizing runs small

If you’ve ever been excited about an online clothing purchase only to be disappointed in the quality, color, fit etc when it arrived - you need to buy this dress! I was invited to a western themed BBQ and needed a dress. I thought I’d take a chance because I too have been disappointed from time to time with the quality and fit of online clothing purchases. I tried this dress on and it was perfect! I bought a L (I’m 5’4 130#). The fit is perfect, the material is flowy and soft, and it’s also lined, beautiful color blue floral print too. I bought light blue cowgirl boots too : ) fingers crossed the boots are as nice as this dress.
Love this dress! Fits true to size and very flattering. Bought it for a birthday dinner and was exactly as pictured. I'm 5'7 and about 150lbs and bought a size small.
Very nice dress
Comfortable, good value, flattering. Fun dress to wear.
I’m short, 5’3, and it’s the perfect length above my knees. It’s very light and flowy, vibrant colors. Love!

I love this cute boho short flowy summer dress! It is lightweight and the fabric is a little bit stretchy. It runs small (but accurate according to the manufacturer's size guide). I normally wear a medium but bought a large based on the size guide and it fits perfectly. If you like your fit to be roomy, order 2 sizes up.  See my outfit photos - I have styled it with 1) a pair of chunky heels, hobo bag and statement earrings OR 2) elevated gold flip flops, gold bag, orange coral bead necklace and lacy gold earrings with a coral accent. I get of compliments!  Edit: I don’t like the neck tie strings at all. I just put them inside the dress and it looks fine. You can’t even tell that they’re a part of the dress. It just looks like a v-neck. Problem solved!  Happy shopping!
Very beautiful model version verses what is delivered. Material is also not soft…returning
No stretch or give too much flounce
I love this dress, I have a co-worker I bought it for too because she loved mine so much.

For $30+ dollars I would expect a bit better quality. The material of this dress is consistent with that of SHEIN. The pattern is very blurry and the material is scratchy. It fits nicely and is flowy but I would not consider it flattering at all. It looks and feels very cheap.  I will be returning.
Sizing is not accurate. Runs Small. Had to return.
Sheer!!!!!
Dress requirements: Seems better if you are thin and tall. I felt silly in it. Like a 2 year old. I am sending it back.

评论概述: Cute but tight across the bust
评论详情: This dress is beautiful and looks pretty but I am a size 8 and got a medium and am a 38 C and it is tight across the bust. Others mentioned larger bust line and it fit. I will have to find my minimizer bra. The colors are beautiful.

Needed a dress at 5 months postpartum and this dress was incredibly flattering. Wore to a wedding in FL and was perfect to keep cool without less coverage. I was worried about the length, but it hits right above the knee. I'm 5'8" so finding short dresses that still cover is hard. I will definitely wear this over and over!
This dress is absolutely adorable on.  It fits perfect the colors are bright and cheerful.  It is my favorite new spring and summer dress.
This product is great. But I had to return mine because I ordered the wrong size. All in all the piece is great and beautiful.

Fit well, light and flowy but not see through.
Super cute dress, but it was much more fitted than it appears in the photos. There was no give in the skirt/lining and it was more straight cut than flowy as it appears. Had to return.
This dress is so cute love it

I wore this for my class’ awards ceremony and received an endless amount of compliments! It’s such a fun and cute dress paired with the ruffles at the bottom, super stylish. Will wear again and would purchase in many different color variations.

I really like this dress!  It looks exactly as it does in the pictures including the colors, the cut and the sheerness.  The waist is extremely stretchy and comfortable.  I consistently a Medium and this fits correctly.  I'm only 5'3 and the dress falls about mid thigh so definitely would consider it a mini especially on taller girls.  The dress is very lightweight so probably not the best for outdoor wear if there's a breeze!

This dress makes me feel so beautiful. It's light, flowy, perfectly sized, and quite comfortable. The colors/pattern and ruffles make the dress feel more expensive than it is. There's no liner, but I wear bike shorts under my dresses anyway, so it doesn't bother me. Such a great buy!
Not as advertised. Absolute crap quality of material. Wrinkles easy & is thin.

I bought this for my granddaughter and when she tried it on, it was obvious that it been on someone else to leave an offending order in the underarm area. Came out after being washed or it would have been returned. (Returns should be checked)

Very cute dress.  I got a lot of compliments on it.  I think it runs a little small though.  I’m 5’3 125 lbs. 34 DD. ordered a medium.  A little tight on top.  Still looked great.  I would buy another in another color or print.

It is perfect for a spring day! Fits well, elastic at the waist is not too tight. Great value for the money. You cannot see through it. Colors are vibrant and pretty. Just love this dress. I'm 5'2 136 36B and got a medium but could have gotten a small.
